Title: Altering the availability or proximity of food, alcohol and tobacco products to change their selection and consumption
Abstract: © 2017 The Cochrane Collaboration. Published by John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.This is a protocol for a Cochrane Review (Intervention). The objectives are as follows: 1. To assess the impact of altering the availability or proximity of: a) food products (including non-alcoholic beverages); b) alcohol products; and c) tobacco products on their selection or consumption. 2. For each of the above products, to assess the extent to which the impact of such interventions is modified by: i) study characteristics; ii) intervention characteristics; and iii) participant characteristics.
